title: 判断是否为平衡二叉树 (判断是否为平衡二叉树)
content: 思路: // @Title: 判断是否为平衡二叉树 (判断是否为平衡二叉树) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2022-03-01 17:29:29 // @Runtime: 1 ms // @Memory: 40.7 MB // @comment: // @flag: /** * Definition for a binary tree node. * public class TreeNode { * int val; * TreeNode left; * TreeNode right; * TreeNode(int x) { val = x; } * } */ class Solution { public boolean isBalanced (TreeNode root) { if(root==null){ return true; } //计算当前子树的差&&左子树是平衡&&右子树是平衡 boolean current=Math.abs(doHigh(root.left)-doHigh(root.right))<=1; return current&&isBalanced(root.left)&&isBalanced(root.right); } public int doHigh(TreeNode root){ if(root==null){ return 0; } if(root.left!=null||root.right!=null){ return Math.max(doHigh(root.left),doHigh(root.right))+1; } return 1; } }
